text: In runtime you determine how you want the rules to be used in the business logic, i e how you want to perform lookup of rules from a workflow by using APL. This chapter contains descriptions of the APL functions that are used for looking up the rules stored in the rules database during provisioning, and includes the following sections: APL - PCC Mapper Support APL - PCC Runtime Support
title: Runtime APL Support for PCC Rules - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
